main event: Observation of a round object in the sky over Twenty-Nine Palms, California on March 17, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 10 minutes,The object was described as the size of a quarter with no distinct color noted,The object moved back and forth during the observation, The report speculates that the object could have been a balloon or aircraft,The sighting occurred in an area with many weather stations known for regular balloon releases.
